Pre-Game Insights: In what promises to be an exciting encounter, India are all set to square off against Afghanistan in the first match of the three-match T20I series at the Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium in Mohali on Thursday, January 11.
Rohit Sharma, the formidable Indian batter, will lead the home side, while Ibrahim Zadran will command the Afghan squad.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium is a well-balanced track, providing opportunities for both batters and bowlers.
